name: Star Fighter 3001
description:
In the year 3001, Earth receives signals from an alien civilization fighting set. Earth Federation has decided to send a reconnaissance team, which investigates the case of alien forces. To combat the alien threat, the World Alliance put forth their great weapon, the Star Fighter. Equipped with weapons like the Lock-on Laser, Plane Spread, Missiles and Bombs, the Star Fighter is Earth's only shot in defeating the invaders. To accomplish this task, you must have the courage and wisdom.

Play now, you can do it!

The Fighter Star 3001, rich scenes and fighter world, simple and excellent! The Fighter Star 3001 is a fast paced combat game, seven different scenes, charming sound and music, with HD graphics and special game play. Screen Press to move, destroy enemies in your adventure!

CHARACTERISTICS

  • Multi controls: switch between tilt and touch controls.

  • 5 different weapons: Spread Plane Tracking Missiles, Directed Missiles, the Laser and Lock-on Laser. Each weapon also has the ability to perform unique super-charged attacks.

  • 3 difficulty levels, each with an individual leaderboard.

  • 7 challenging levels ranging from Earth to outer space.

  • 20 different enemy types, three different gems.

  • 7 Bosses with rich attack patterns and transformations.

  • Amazing Lighting and Special Effects

  • 3 original fighters waiting to unlock, when you passed all levels Easy/Normal/Hard, Thunder and Lightning will be available for the game. Thunder and Lightning are also available by purchasing the Pro version.

Simple game rule but surprisingly challenging. Enjoy being a Star Fighter!
